body_text:
This depends on #393. I didn't bother making it standalone since I suspect there'd be a merge conflict anyway given that the file being edited is moved/created in the first PR.
Desktop QA had questions about what the add-on logs to Telemetry, so I added a bit in the docs linking to the official Telemetry docs on what the Heartbeat ping contains.

title: Link to Telemetry docs for heartbeat pings
body:
This depends on #393. I didn't bother making it standalone since I suspect there'd be a merge conflict anyway given that the file being edited is moved/created in the first PR.

Desktop QA had questions about what the add-on logs to Telemetry, so I added a bit in the docs linking to the official Telemetry docs on what the Heartbeat ping contains.
